# importwqd

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/NBEP/importwqd/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/NBEP/importwqd)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/NBEP/importwqd/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/NBEP/importwqd/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

importwqd is an auxiliary package for [wqdashboard](https://github.com/NBEP/wqdashboard). Its functions are designed to import, standardize, and format data for wqdashboard. 

## Installation

You can install importwqd from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install
install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github('NBEP/importwqd')

# load
library(importwqd)
```
